constexpr ranges::subrange&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;&gt;
    /*find_next*/( ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt; it );

Searches for the next occurrence of pattern in the underlying view. Equivalent to:
{{#vardefine:ba|{{rlpsi|/#base_}}}}{{#vardefine:pa|{{rlpsi|/#pattern_}}}}
{{box|{{c/core|1=
auto [b, e] = ranges::search(ranges::subrange(it, ranges::end(}}{{#var:ba}}{{c/core|)),}}{{nbspt}}{{#var:pa}}{{c/core|1=);

if (b != ranges::end(}}{{#var:ba}}{{c/core|) and ranges::empty(}}{{#var:pa}}{{c/core|))
{
    ++b;
    ++e;
}

return {b, e};
}}}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|it|an iterator to the position at which to start the search}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A subrange that represents the next position of the pattern, if it was found. An empty subrange otherwise.
